name: Palette (CauliFlowerz, Risamisu, Apoal, SlyBebop, Rambar, Loïc da Silva, SamuelBUSSON)
name_original: Palette (CauliFlowerz, Risamisu, Apoal, SlyBebop, Rambar, Loïc da Silva, SamuelBUSSON)
description:
_______________________________

                             In the world of Palette, colors are no more. Depending on the color you have chosen for it, the same shape can bring life to something totally different.

                             Choose your brushes wisely to solve the puzzles of Palette and unveil its story :  a story born from your own imagination!

                             Follow the rite of passage of a young girl, half-human half-bird, willing to tame her new power and her new body.


                             Listen to your inner creativity and enjoy the beauty of your art, a watercolor painting with thousands of colors, depicting your own way to evolve in a world totally unknown to you.

_______________________________

_______________________________


                             This game was created in three months by seven French students from the school CNAM-ENJMIN.

  • LOIC DA SILVA : Game Design & Level Design | LinkedIn
  • CHIARA ROSMARINO : Game Design & Level Design | LinkedIn
  • SAMUEL BUSSON : Programming & VFX | LinkedIn
  • DAMIEN DROUILLARD : Sound Design
  • THOMAS IMBERT : Composition | LinkedIn
  • LISA BERMIS : Game Art | LinkedIn
  • LUCAS BELAROUCI : Production | LinkedIn
